Question.Subject: I have an annoying problem with Firefox?
Question.Content:
You know how in Microsoft Word or Yahoo Answers when you are typing there is a flashing bar after the words? I've been seeing this flashing bar when I click on random things on pages all over the internet. I can click on where it says "Yahoo!Answers" on the top for example and a large flashing bar will appear a little in front of the "Y". When I read articles or something on the internet I can click on the works and there will be a flashing bar as if I'm writing the article.
How can I get rid of this stupid thing? It's super annoying.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Just press F7 to disable the caret browsing.

Answer.Content: Just press F7 to disable the caret browsing.
